name: VeracodePipelineScan
description: This task can be used to publish html reports to azdo. Currently Jmeter HTML reports are being transformed to be consumed into Azdo directly
author: JulianTotzek-Hallhuber

inputs.name: VeracodeAPIID
inputs.label: Veracode API ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Veracode API ID can be generated on the Veracode platform.

inputs.name: VeracodeAPIsecret
inputs.label: Veracode API Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Veracode API Secret can be generated on the Veracode platfomr

inputs.name: fileToScan
inputs.label: File to scan with the Pipeline Scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: File to scan with the Veracode Pipeline Scan. For packaging instructions please reference https://help.veracode.com/r/compilation_packaging

inputs.name: policyName
inputs.label: Veracode Policy Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Veracode pipeline scna allowes to rate the findings according a platform policy. Please name the Veracode policy to download before the scan and rate the results accordingly

inputs.name: baselineFile
inputs.label: Baseline File
inputs.helpMarkDown: A pipeline scan baseline file to sort out previous findings. Veracode pipeline scan allows to sort out previous findings. This file is called a baseline file and need to be present on your repository.

inputs.name: additionalFlags
inputs.label: Additional Flags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional flags to be applied to the pipeline scan, please review https://help.veracode.com/r/r_pipeline_scan_commands for options.
